summary: Fantasy sports platform similar to Dream11, including website and mobile app for creating fantasy teams and competing in contests
architectural_notes: Multi-platform: web and mobile app required
Real-time data integration needed for live match updates
Scalable backend to handle concurrent users during live matches
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Fantasy sports hero banner with dynamic athletes and stadium atmosphere (hero-banner.dim_1200x400.png)
- Trophy icon for contest winners in metallic gold style (trophy-icon.dim_128x128.png)
- Player card placeholder silhouette for athlete profiles (player-placeholder.dim_200x200.png)

existing_features.title: Implement user registration and authentication system allowing users to sign up and log in securely using Internet Identity
Build fantasy team creation interface where users can select players from different positions within a budget constraint
Create contest/league system allowing users to join competitions with entry fees and prize pools
Build leaderboard display showing contest rankings with user teams sorted by total points
Integrate Stripe payment system for contest entry fee payments
Implement wallet system for managing user balance, tracking deposits, entry fees, and winnings
Design and apply a modern, sporty visual theme with vibrant colors (greens and oranges), bold typography, and card-based layouts suitable for a competitive fantasy sports platform

new_feature_requests.summary: Fantasy team creation with player selection
Contest/league system for users to compete
Points scoring system based on real match performance
Payment integration for contest entry fees
Wallet system for managing winnings and deposits
Create a player database storing athlete information including name, team, position, current form, and base price
Implement backend logic to save and retrieve user fantasy teams with validation for budget limits and position constraints
Implement points scoring system that calculates fantasy team scores based on player performance metrics (goals, assists, clean sheets, etc.)
